ul.li: For "background-image", with a value of "no-repeat", the image is not repeated.

body.p: If statement above is true, this paragraph should have an oval button image which is not repeated. The rules applied are "p {background-image: url(ovalbbut.gif); background-repeat: no-repeat}". All other properties of this page should be UA-default. aaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaa
